question: Show drugs with variant-based evidence in Chronic Myelogenous Leukaemia.
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (v)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Does BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 L384M predict response to Axitinib in Chronic Granulocytic Leukaemia?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 L384M'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Axitinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Axitinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Axitinib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

placeholders.variant_name: BCR BCR::ABL1 Fusion AND ABL1 L384M

question: List genes associated with resistance to Lorlatinib in Malignant Mesothelioma Of Pleura.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lorlatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lorlatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lorlatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'malignant' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pleural' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'mesothelioma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Gefitinib or Docetaxel in Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Gefitinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Gefitinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Gefitinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes are targeted by Akt Inhibitor MK2206?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')
)
RETURN
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 50

question: Show therapies for EGFR where variants cause resistance in Head And Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('EGFR')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('EGFR'))
MATCH (v:Variant)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

placeholders.disease_name: Head And Neck Squamous Cell Carcinoma

question: In Ovary Neoplasm, what therapies target genes causing resistance to Picoplatin?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Picoplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Picoplatin'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Picoplatin')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Picoplatin')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes confer resistance to Venetoclax in Lymphoid Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Venetoclax')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Venetoclax'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Venetoclax')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What therapies target TOP1 but NOT FKBP1A, and have biomarker evidence in Triple-receptor Negative Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('FKBP1A')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FKBP1A'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'triple-receptor' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'negative' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Fluorouracil in Malignant Neoplasm, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Fluorouracil')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fluorouracil'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fluorouracil')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Fluorouracil')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'triple-receptor' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'negative' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes influence response to Atezolizumab for Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Atezolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Atezolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Atezolizumab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: In Malignant Neoplasm, what therapies target genes linked to resistance to Imatinib?

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Imatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )

WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,

LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Ionizing Radiotherapy in Uterine Cervical Neoplasm.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Ionizing Radiotherapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ionizing Radiotherapy'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ionizing Radiotherapy')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cervical'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Ionizing Radiotherapy')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

LIMIT 100

question: In Breast Cancer, what therapies target genes causing resistance to PI3Ka/Di?
cypher:

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('PI3Ka/Di')

)

AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for Olaparib or Sirolimus in Breast Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Olaparib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Sirolimus')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Sirolimus'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Sirolimus')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Chemotherapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Chemotherapy'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Chemotherapy')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Chemotherapy')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

)

    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'

)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')

LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'with' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'bcr-abl1'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to ALK Inhibitor TAE684 in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('ALK Inhibitor TAE684')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Alectinib in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Alectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alectinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alectinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Alectinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma, what therapies target genes causing resistance to MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('MUC1-targeted Peptide GO-203-2C')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to FEC Regimen or Afimoxifene in Primary Breast Cancer?

question: List resistance genes for Erlotinib or Foretinib in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Foretinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Foretinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Foretinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with sensitivity to Cabazitaxel in Prostatic Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cabazitaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cabazitaxel'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cabazitaxel')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Cytarabine in Precursor B Lymphoblastic Lymphoma/leukemia, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Cytarabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cytarabine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cytarabine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Cytarabine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Nilotinib in Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Nilotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Nilotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Nilotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids

  NULL AS variant_name,

  disease_name,
  pmids

question: List therapies targeting TOP1 (not POLD1) with evidence in Triple-receptor Negative Breast Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('POLD1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('POLD1'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'triple-receptor' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'negative' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Temozolomide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Temozolomide')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'glioblastoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes does Adavosertib target?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Adavosertib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Adavosertib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Adavosertib')
)
RETURN
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 50

question: What genes are sensitivity biomarkers for AGS324 in Primary Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('AGS324')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AGS324'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('AGS324')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Durvalumab in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Durvalumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Durvalumab'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Durvalumab')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Durvalumab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bicalutamide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bicalutamide')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'prostate'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict resistance to Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor or Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Mitogen-Activated Protein Kinase Kinase Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Capmatinib in Lung Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Capmatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capmatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capmatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Capmatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('ARAF')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('ARAF'))
WITH t, r, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
RETURN
  gi.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with resistance to Trastuzumab in Gastric Adenocarcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Trastuzumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Trastuzumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Trastuzumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastric' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Capecitabine')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capecitabine'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capecitabine')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Capecitabine')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: List resistance genes for Cisplatin or Lapatinib in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Lapatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lapatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lapatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Datopotamab Deruxtecan'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Datopotamab Deruxtecan')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  NULL AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('RG7112')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: What biomarkers have therapy response evidence in Endometrioid Adenoma Or Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'endometrial' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with sensitivity to Fluorouracil in Colorectal Adenocarcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fluorouracil')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fluorouracil'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fluorouracil')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: How does BRAF V600E AND ERBB2 Amplification AND SMAD4 LOSS AND TP53 V218E influence response to Bevacizumab for Pancreatic Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (v:Variant {name: 'BRAF V600E AND ERBB2 Amplification AND SMAD4 LOSS AND TP53 V218E'})-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
MATCH (v)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Bevacizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bevacizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bevacizumab')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'pancreatic'
  )
RETURN
  v.name AS variant_name,
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: In Breast Cancer, which genes confer resistance to Fulvestrant or Pictilisib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fulvestrant')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pictilisib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fulvestrant'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pictilisib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fulvestrant')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pictilisib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What therapies hit TOP1 but exclude AURKA?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('AURKA')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AURKA'))
WITH t, r, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
RETURN
  gi.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Anti-PD1 Monoclonal Antibody in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Anti-PD1 Monoclonal Antibody')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Anti-PD1 Monoclonal Antibody'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Anti-PD1 Monoclonal Antibody')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Anti-PD1 Monoclonal Antibody')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Metformin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Metformin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Metformin')
)
  AND (
    toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('NDUFB2')
    OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('NDUFB2'))
  )
RETURN
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Show treatments hitting FGFR1 that have biomarker evidence in Cholangiosarcoma.
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('FGFR1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('FGFR1'))
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cholangiocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(bg:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE bg.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes affect response to Capivasertib in Tumor Of Endometrium?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Capivasertib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Capivasertib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Capivasertib')
)
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'endometrial'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

  disease_name,
  pmids

question: For resistance to Paclitaxel in Endometrioid Carcinoma Of Female Reproductive System, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Paclitaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Paclitaxel'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Paclitaxel')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'endometrial' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Paclitaxel')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Carcinoma, which genes confer resistance to Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody or Crizotinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Crizotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Crizotinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Anti-PD-L1 Monoclonal Antibody')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Crizotinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: In Colorectal Cancer, which genes confer resistance to PD-1 Ligand Inhibitor or Irinotecan?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PD-1 Ligand Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Irinotecan')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PD-1 Ligand Inhibitor'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Irinotecan'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PD-1 Ligand Inhibitor')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Irinotecan')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colorectal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Melphalan')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Midostaurin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Melphalan'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Midostaurin'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Melphalan')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Midostaurin')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'multiple' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What is Flutamide's mechanism of action on AR?
cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(g:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Flutamide')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Flutamide'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Flutamide')
)
  AND (
    toLower(g.symbol) = toLower('AR')
    OR any(s IN coalesce(g.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AR'))
  )
RETURN
  g.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
